description: This file implements an OAuth callback page component for handling OAuth redirect responses from third-party services. It processes query parameters, manages OAuth flow states, calls an API to finalize OAuth connections, and provides user feedback with status indicators and navigation.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackContent
methods.description: Main React component that processes OAuth redirect parameters, interacts with backend API, and displays status to the user.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Wrapper component that provides Suspense fallback and renders the OAuthCallbackContent component.
